abstract: Do you have any snow day rituals? Do you like to play in the snow? Would you go sledding or have a snowball fight? Or would you rather stay inside and keep warm?
snippet: Do you have any snow day rituals? Do you like to play in the snow? Would you go sledding or have a snowball fight? Or would you rather stay inside and keep warm?

headline.main: What Would You Do on a Snow Day?
